title: GSE Opportunities : Defence Nuclear Safety Committee Roles ×2

content.text: The Defence Nuclear Safety Committee (DNSC) is the primary source of independent advice to the Secretary of State for Defence on nuclear safety issues associated with the Defence Nuclear Programmes. It is an advisory non-departmental public body sponsored by the Ministry of Defence, and consists of a chair and 11 members from a diverse range of backgrounds in both the public and private sectors.
Please note, both vacancies are is eligible for UK Nationals only. UK residency is also required.
